abstract: Odell Beckham Jr returns to New York Giants practice, following one-game suspension for his actions on field during game against Carolina Panthers; repeats his apologies for behavior that he characterizes as poor sportsmanship and says he views incident as learning experience; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Beckham returned to the team for the first time since his suspension and remained apologetic, vowing that he will learn from the experience and “won’t do it again.”

headline.main: Odell Beckham Jr. Continues Apologizing in Return to Giants
headline.print_headline: Beckham Continues Apologizing in Return to Giants

snippet: Beckham returned to the team for the first time since his suspension and remained apologetic, vowing that he will learn from the experience and “won’t do it again.”
